description: At Italian Restaurant, we serve classic Italian dishes made with fresh ingredients.

menu.description: At Italian Restaurant, enjoy our selection of hearty main courses.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Traditional baked pasta with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese
items.image_prompt: A classic photo of Lasagna, layered with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Tagliata Di Manzo
items.description: Sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A photo of Tagliata di Manzo, grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Risotto Ai Funghi
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A photo of creamy Risotto ai Funghi with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan, served at Italian Restaurant.
